The zamorak mjolnir is a two-handed weapon. To obtain one, either complete the Enchanted Key miniquest or trade with another player. As its name implies, the zamorak mjolnir is affiliated with the god Zamorak. It is tipped with Zamorak's symbol of horns.

Each mjolnir can only be obtained once per account, as the enchanted key will disintegrate after the player finds all of the treasure. Once this happens, the key cannot be re-obtained.

[[File:Zamorak mjolnir detail.png|130px|left]]
The '''zamorak mjolnir''' is a two-handed [[weapon]]. To obtain one, either complete the [[Enchanted Key]] [[miniquest]] or trade with another player. As its name implies, the zamorak mjolnir is affiliated with the god [[Zamorak]]. It is tipped with Zamorak's symbol of horns.

Each mjolnir can only be obtained '''once''' per account, as the [[Enchanted key (item)|enchanted key]] will disintegrate after the player finds all of the treasure. Once this happens, the key '''cannot''' be re-obtained.
